# UFW Firewall Rules Export
# Generated by: Srushti Dave
# Task: Setup and Use a Firewall on Linux (UFW)
# Date: (Replace with current date)

Status: active

     To                         Action      From
     --                         ------      ----
[ 1] 22/tcp                     ALLOW IN    Anywhere
[ 2] 23/tcp                     DENY IN     Anywhere
[ 3] 22/tcp (v6)                ALLOW IN    Anywhere (v6)
[ 4] 23/tcp (v6)                DENY IN     Anywhere (v6)

# Notes:
# - Port 22 (SSH) is allowed for secure remote access.
# - Port 23 (Telnet) is denied due to plaintext communication.
# - Default policy: deny incoming, allow outgoing.
# - Exported using: sudo ufw status numbered | sudo tee ufw_rules.txt
